message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I believe I can find value in your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a budget of $150. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $150?
I understand your budget constraint, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $165.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $150 to finalize the purchase.
I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $160. This is my final offer before considering other options.
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. I would like to propose a final price of $150 to conclude our negotiations.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'll meet you at $155, and that's my final offer.
